creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council in honor of Christopher Monkhouse with proceeds from the 2006 and 2007 Antiques Show and Sale
description: eight-sided table with eight thin, tapering turned legs all connected with horizontal bars near bottom to central spindle with turned finial on bottom; eight horizontal bars--curved at bottom--connect legs just under tabletop; brass caps and wheels on bottom of legs
title: Octagonal table
